name: Grilled Peppers
author: Deedle Gee
summary: A friend made this the other day and it was great, so I had to share. The more colors you use the more colorful it is. Our friend just sprinkled oregano. We added the jalapeno for heat.
ingredients: 3  green bell peppers, cut into large chunks
directions: Preheat a grill for medium-high heat
When the grill is hot, lightly oil the grate
Place the pepper pieces onto the grill with the inside facing down
Cook until slightly charred, 3 to 5 minutes
Turn peppers over, and place jalapeno slices onto them
Top with some mozzarella cheese, and sprinkle with a bit of oregano
Grill until cheese melts, then remove to a plate and serve
